title: para_vision
author: para_vision
content: Bounty Campaign OverviewPara Token is announcing its first Bounty. The goal of the Campaign is to promote PARA #Airdrop for Early Communitymembers, increase our community, help vote listings towards exchanges and bring general awareness of our currency to the greater crypto world.10,000,000 PARA Tokens are reserved for the entire bounty pool for eligible participants.We will be running this bounty campaign for at least 4 weeks and possibly extend it. Also please check back to see new bounties we will add.Right to stop or add new bounties at anytime reserved.General Bounty RulesAll bounty participants are required to join Para Communities social accounts:1. Join Para/Transcendence Telegram group: https://t.me/teloscointranscendenceblockchain2. Follow Para/Transcendence Twitter page: https://twitter.com/teloscoin3. Join Para Discord: https://discord.gg/z8zzw7CSxG4. Claim your airdrop: https://airdrop.paraverse.rocks  -> to this address we will also send the bounty rewards and it is added to future airdrops automatically5. Post a friendly post here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5461669.msg62633872#msg62633872If you have done this, you can follow this thread in order to participate in current and future bounties, airdrops and random gifts. We reserve the following rights to: 1. remove a bounty participant from any Campaign if we believe that his/her behavior is dishonest, unacceptable or inappropriate.2. make changes to the terms of Bounty Campaigns, including, but not limited to stakes that bounty participants will be rewarded with.3. pause or completely terminate any or all running bounty Campaigns.4. to increase or decrease the proportion of tokens allocated to our Bounty Campaign.Bounty participants are prohibited from posting any content that may be considered defamatory to Para Meme Token reputation or discredit its public image in some way.One person is not allowed to use multiple accounts to participate in our Bounty Campaign.Spreadsheet will be updated every Sunday (first time 13th of August 2023), Forum Default TimeTokens will be distributed to bounty participants within 4 weeks after the bounty campaign is complete.Twitter Campaign Rules & Qualifications:Twitter account with at least 100 real followers in order to be allowed to participateParticipants must follow PARA's official Twitter profile: https://twitter.com/teloscoinThe tasks below can only be done once and will only be paid once.Twitter Campaign Rewards: 1000 Para Meme Tokens for all Twitter tasks below:(These tasks can only be done once, and will be rewarded only once.)Follow https://twitter.com/teloscoinRetweet Four (3) Para Token tweets:https://twitter.com/teloscoin/status/1686462943263592448?s=20https://twitter.com/teloscoin/status/1686439952135966743?s=20https://twitter.com/teloscoin/status/1687878876565790720?s=20Create a Custom/Personal Tweet about Para Token and Tag 3 Crypto-currency Experts or websites:Custom/Personal tweets about Para must contain a link to BitcoinToken's website : https://btk.communityCustom/Personal tweets about Para must contain the following hashtags: #paratoken #para #cryptoTweets must consist of at least 40 characters.Tag 3 Crypto-currency websites with your tweet. eg. @coinbase @BTCTN @CointelegraphPost your reports on this bounty thread.Submit your reports as following:Code:Twitter Username:Real Followers:Audit Link:Followed Three Twitter Handles?: YES/NORetweeted 3 Tweets from ParaToken?: YES/NOBEP20 Address:Retweets:1.2.3.Custom/Personal Tweet:1.The official Token Contract is: 0x8A5652EB940dD3832a8426FBe5afBB01b0f96a14Announcement Channel: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5461669.msg62633872#msg62633872In case you own TELOS or XBTX, you can still swap them at fixes ratio. Later the market value will vary and you can use the ubcoming defi bridge we are working on. Stay tuned.. good things ahead!
